techmeme.title: Google unveils AI-based Scam Detection in Google Messages in English, Android features like live location sharing in the Find My app, and new Pixel features (Jess Weatherbed/The Verge)
OpenAI unveils NextGenAI, a consortium of research institutions including Harvard, MIT, and Oxford, and commits $50M in compute, API access, and research grants (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Source: Amazon is building a new "hybrid reasoning" AI model, slated for a June launch under the Nova brand, hoping it can be more price-efficient than rivals (Eugene Kim/Business Insider)
Nvidia GeForce RTX 5070 review: great 1440p performance, compact, and DLSS is useful, but high power use, only 12GB of RAM, runs hot, and availability is tricky (Andrew Cunningham/Ars Technica)
Swap, which uses AI to help DTC, e-commerce brands with inventory management, raised a $40M Series B led by Iconiq Growth and plans an international expansion (Julia Hornstein/Business Insider)
